name: Build Flutter Web (for Vercel)

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  workflow_dispatch:

permissions:
  contents: write

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Flutter
        uses: subosito/flutter-action@v2
        with:
          channel: stable

      - name: Flutter pub get
        run: flutter pub get

      - name: Build web (release)
        run: flutter build web --release

      - name: Prepare deploy folder (web_dist)
        run: |
          rm -rf web_dist
          mkdir -p web_dist
          cp -r build/web/* web_dist/

      - name: Commit built files (web_dist)
        uses: stefanzweifel/git-auto-commit-action@v5
        with:
          commit_message: "ci: build web to web_dist [skip ci]"
          commit_user_name: "github-actions"
          commit_user_email: "actions@users.noreply.github.com"
          file_pattern: web_dist/**
